text: Edwin "Ed" Reinecke (January 7, 1924 - December 24, 2016) was an American politician. He served in the U.S. House of Representatives. He also served under Ronald Reagan as the 39th Lieutenant Governor of California from 1969 to 1974. Reinecke was born on January 7, 1924 in Medford, Oregon. He died on December 24, 2016 in Laguna Hills, California of natural causes, aged 92.Ed Reinecke, California lieutenant governor who resigned after perjury conviction, dies at 92 ==References== ==Other websites== *Congressional biography *Video: Reinecke discusses drug trafficking Category:1924 births Category:2016 deaths Category:United States representatives from California Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lieutenant Governors of California Category:Politicians from Medford, Oregon
title: Edwin Reinecke
